name: Nemesis (itch) (Artise1)
description:
Northampton Unviersity 2019 Games Jam winner. 

In this game we created you play as the squishy little square that must escape the lab full of traps. Use timing and your platforming skills to complete this short but hard game.

For this games jam we were meant to be in teams of 5 but it ended up just being the two of us game artists without a programmer. We managed to beat full teams of 2nd and 3rd year student, GO US!!!

Hope you have fun/rage at playing our little game.
